div.pre: 690 Veliƒçkovo, c. 12 km. NW of Pazardzik, Bulgaria, 1937 Burial: c. 500 B.C. (T) Contents: 10 AR. Pot hoard Derrones: decadr. Disposition: Sofia 9; Pazardzik Gerasimov, BIAB 11 (1937), pp. 249-57, illus; NC 1938, pp. 80-4, illus.; BIAB 20 (1955), pp. 576-7, illus.
